buildCommand: npm install --prefix ../.. && npm exec --prefix ../.. tsc -p ../../packages/config/tsconfig.json && npm exec --prefix ../.. tsc -p ../../packages/commands/tsconfig.json && npm exec --prefix ../.. tsc -p ../../packages/ui/tsconfig.json && (NEXT_IGNORE_INCORRECT_LOCKFILE=1 npm run build --prefix ../../apps/web || true)
